name: Week#5 Western
description:
Theme song taken from : http://www.freesfx.co.uk

Gun model taken from: kenny assets https://www.kenney.nl/

Water: LowPoly Water by EBRU DOGAN from Unity  AssetStore 

Controls: Arrows, Space to shoot

Week5: 20.09-27.09.2018 (behind the deadline - wanted to finish on Monday 24.09) 

Constraints:  Blender & Unity game

Core Dynamic: Shooting

Summary: I really want to make 3d games. Its a pretty big goal but to reach it I need to know my way around Blender. It was pretty fun and pretty tiresome to make the map and the  player. All in all when I have passed the deadline it actually went through my mind to just give up but than I just picked myself up and went on with the project to at least do something fun. I am glad I did because I actually started having fun finishing the game instead of finding it tiresome. 

What went bad: I didn't spend all the available time on this and didn't work as hard as I could. I think that it was because of  bad time management. I will have to work on this and hopefully next weeks prototype game will be better. This time I have to meet the deadline on Monday 1.10 event if I am going to do a simple 2d game this time (but I am hoping to use some free store assets to actually make something bigger that this weeks project :D ).
